name: "Kaboom King"
description: A huge, imposing, life-sized model of one of the targets used in Akitsu Harpastum, said to be inspired by a certain "long-horned oni" and (self-proclaimed) "Numero Uno."\n"If one little harpastum's all it takes to bring down a big, bad, horned Kaboom King, why would anyone ever be afraid of nightmares again?"
